Career Description

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran and basis of disability or any other federal, state or local protected class:The Data Analyst Lead will provide support for the current operating model, as well as support for new initiatives within a constantly evolving business environment. The Analyst is responsible for assisting with the support and business requirements of the Merchandising and Inventory Team; including ensuring integrity of data within the applications through governance of system inputs, and the coordination, development and management of various systems/processes for forecasting and planning and analysis. The Analyst will be an integral part of the Company's strategic initiatives by creating value through actionable business insight delivered through reporting and ad-hoc analysis tools.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES include the following. Career Requirements

QUALIFICATIONS

Demonstrated analytical skills required

Advanced use of Excel, PowerPoint and Access

Experience with metrics-based analytics, basic understanding of SQL and relational databases

Experience with JDA Replenishment Systems and CMS Core Merchandising System; knowledge of general replenishment and merchandising systems

Data warehouse data mining experience

Familiar with P&L reporting and metrics-based reports

End-to-end understanding of merchandise planning and replenishment, merchandising, business, and supply chain processes

Ability to cultivate relationships with key stakeholders across functions in order to achieve business objectives and drive strategic change

Project management/process improvement experience

Experience working in retail industry

EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE

Bachelor's degree in economics, finance, or business; and 3-5 years experience in the areas of budgeting, forecasting, reporting, finance or business analysis; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
